meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Bosnia and Herzegovina, equal to one hundredth of a mark.
meanings.sent1: In Bosnia and Herzegovina, you can buy a lot of candies with just one fening.
meanings.sent2: I found a fening on the street and decided to keep it as a lucky charm.
meanings.sent3: The fening rolled away from the piggy bank and went on an adventure around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny fening, brightening up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fening dropping into the jar echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: A small coin of Bosnia and Herzegovina, equal to one fening.
meanings.sent1: My grandma gave me a fening to buy a treat from the corner store.
meanings.sent2: The children collected fening coins to donate to the charity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel buried the fening in the garden, thinking it was a nut.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like a handful of fening coins falling on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes sparkled when he saw the shiny fening in the child's hand.
